title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to login to the account with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Payment gateway failed during checkout process.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer requested dark mode feature in the app.

title: Bug Report
description: App crashes when uploading profile picture.

title: Account Deletion Request
description: Customer requested deletion of their account permanently.

title: Password Reset
description: Customer forgot password and cannot reset via email link.

title: App Slow Performance
description: Customer reported app is very slow after latest update.

title: Subscription Cancellation
description: Customer wants to cancel their monthly subscription.

title: Wrong Invoice
description: Invoice generated shows wrong billing amount.

title: Notification Error
description: Customer is not receiving push notifications.

title: Data Sync Issue
description: Data not syncing between mobile app and web dashboard.

title: Profile Update Failure
description: Customer unable to update profile picture and bio.
